data.text: Di lɔnnila a tuli matima a baba xa marasi nan na,
Mixi fanyi xa wɔyɛnyie fe fanyi nan naminima,
Mixi naxan a dɛ suxuma, a xun nakelima nɛ,
Tunnaxɔnɛ xa fefe mu sɔɔnɛyama,
Wule mu rafan tinxintɔɛ ma,
Tinxinyi tinxintɔɛ makantama nɛ,
Mixi nde a yɛtɛ findima banna nan na,
Banna xa kɔbiri a xun sarama mixi kobie ma,
Tinxintɔɛ luxi nɛ alɔ lanpui dɛxɛxi,
Yɛtɛ igboɲa gere nan nabulama,
Harige naxan sɔtɔma tinxintareya kui, a sigama xurun na nɛ,
Xa mixi mu a waxɔnfe sɔtɔma, a tɔɔrɔma nɛ,
Mixi naxan yoma marasi ma, a na sare sɔtɔma nɛ,
Xaxilima xa marasi findima simaya nan na,
Fahaamui findima hinnɛ nan na mixi bɛ,
Xaxilima a xa lɔnni rawalima,
Xɛɛra tinxintare findima tɔɔrɛ nan saabui ra,
Mixi naxan tondima marasi ra, a setareɲa nun yaagi sɔtɔma nɛ,
A ɲɔxun, mixi waxɔnfe na raba a bɛ,
Mixi na lu xaxilima fɔxɔ ra, a fan xaxili sɔtɔma nɛ,
Yunubitɔɛ sare findima fe ɲaaxi nan na,
Mixi fanyi kɛ luma a xa mamadie nan bɛ,
Baloe gbegbe minima nɛ setare xa xɛ ma,
Babɛ naxan mu a xa di xuruma luxusinyi ra,
Tinxintɔɛ wasama nɛ baloe ra,
